Articles.Content: I just downloaded the lionhead aerospace landers and probes pack. The only command pods I get are for cassini and huygens. All the other pods are in the lionhead folder but don't show up in game. I think I just need to edit the cfg. Help?
Well, the mod is for KSP 0.25.0, and a lot has changed since then, including CFG files, so that's probably why. You are probably correct in that you just need to bring the CFG files up-to-date.
